content: Why doesn't OfLocalizationSpanTarget generate a hyperlink in on this page? I assumed it was due to missing the namespace, but Locally links correctly on the same page without namespace.

Yongle Hu said:

but Locally links correctly on the same page without namespace

Because it is defined in the same file, which can be detected automatically. Definitions in upstream files must be written with full namespaces. Definitions in downstream files cannot be linked at all.

Yongle Hu saidï¼š

Why doesn't OfLocalizationSpanTarget generate a hyperlink in on this page?

Should be fixed in #26817.
Yongle Hu has marked this topic as resolved.
